TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StrongNameIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class StrongNameIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class StrongNameIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: 定義強式名稱的識別權限。

span.span: Defines the identity permission for strong names.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有的使用權限狀態值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 版和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in version 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定成功，不論身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 使用確認呼叫端程式碼是在特定的強式名稱的程式碼的組件。Use to confirm that the calling code is in a particular strong-named code assembly. 對於需求的完整堆疊中的所有組件具有正確的辨識項，滿足此需求時，才會成功。Full demands for succeed only if all the assemblies in the stack have the correct evidence to satisfy the demand. 連結要求使用屬性成功只有立即呼叫端具有正確的辨識項。Link demands that use the attribute succeed only if the immediate caller has the correct evidence. 強式名稱識別為基礎的密碼編譯的公用金鑰，稱為 「 二進位大型物件 (BLOB)，選擇性地使用特定的組件的版本與名稱結合。A strong name identity is based on a cryptographic public key called a binary large object (BLOB), which is optionally combined with the name and version of a specific assembly. 索引鍵定義唯一的命名空間，並提供名稱為合法版本，因為名稱的定義必須由對應的私密金鑰所簽署的組件中的強式驗證。The key defines a unique namespace and provides strong verification that the name is genuine, because the definition of the name must be in an assembly that is signed by the corresponding private key. 請注意，強式名稱金鑰的有效性不依存的信任關係，或任何索引鍵一定要發行的憑證。Note that the validity of the strong name key is not dependent on a trust relationship or on any certificate necessarily being issued for the key. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，於身分識別的權限的需求會生效，即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是即使呼叫組件具有完全信任，如果組件不符合要求的準則就會失敗的識別權限的要求。That is, even if the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 和更新版本，身分識別的權限的需求都是無效，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 這可確保所有的權限的一致性，並排除所識別權限的特殊案例的處理方式。This ensures consistency for all permissions and eliminates the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 強式名稱的完整說明，請參閱參考頁面。For a complete description of strong names, see the reference page. 如需有關強式名稱組件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 強式名稱組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md)。For more information about strong-named assemblies, see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md). 類別用來定義存取型別的公用成員的強式名稱需求。The class is used to define strong-name requirements for accessing the public members of a type. 屬性可以用來定義強式名稱組件層級的需求。The attribute can be used to define strong-name requirements at the assembly level. 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，您也可以使用屬性來指定該組件中的所有非公用類型會顯示另一個組件。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, you can also use the attribute to specify that all nonpublic types in that assembly are visible to another assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Friend Assemblies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055) (Friend 組件)。For more information, see [Friend Assemblies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055).

span.span: Strong-Named Assemblies
Friend Assemblies

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立完全限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`權限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有的使用權限狀態值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 版和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in version 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定成功，不論身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限的要求是有效的即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但是，如果組件不符合要求的準則識別權限的要求即會失敗。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 和更新版本，身分識別的權限的需求都是無效，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會將身分識別的權限的特殊案例的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 使用這個建構函式的權限狀態的值與建立比對任何強式名稱識別權限。Use this constructor with a permission state value of to create an identity permission that matches no strong names. 如果您之後設定和屬性、 特定的強式名稱身分識別可以由權限。If you subsequently set the and properties, a specific strong name identity can be represented by the permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`並`version`參數可以是`null`僅當公開金鑰用來識別組件。The `name` and `version` parameters can be `null` only when the public key is used to identify the assembly. 空字串 ("") 不應取代`null`。An empty string ("") should not be used in place of `null`. 如果`name`為空字串，就會擲回。If `name` is an empty string, an is thrown. 如需有關名稱和組件的版本號碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[強式名稱組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md)。For more information on names and version numbers of assemblies, see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#8)]

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此範例中的最佳用途是建置及執行完整的範例，並檢視其輸出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限；如果交集是空的，則為 。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission, or if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 兩個相同的強式名稱識別權限的交集是相同的權限。The intersection of two identical strong name identity permissions is the same permission. 交集的兩個不同 （不是萬用字元） expressions 是空的權限。The intersection of two different (not wildcard) expressions is an empty permission. 萬用字元運算式和比對的強式名稱的交集為強式名稱。The intersection of a wildcard expression and a matching strong name is the strong name. 比對的兩個萬用字元運算式的交集是較長，更具體的兩個運算式。The intersection of two wildcard expressions that match is the longer, more specific of the two expressions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用的結果方法，不是如何使用方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此範例中的最佳用途是建置及執行完整的範例，並檢視其輸出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#4)]

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前權限屬於不同的類型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前權限是指定權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的使用權限會指定一組完全包含在指定的權限的作業，目前的使用權限是指定的權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 比方說，則相同的其他屬性，與身分識別內含的萬用字元運算式 MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* 屬性識別為與身分識別的子集MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile 屬性.For example, the other properties being equal, an identity with the property containing the wildcard expression MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* is identified as a subset of an identity with the property MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用的結果方法，不是如何使用方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此範例中的最佳用途是建置及執行完整的範例，並檢視其輸出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定強式名稱身分識別的簡單名稱部分。

span.span: Gets or sets the simple name portion of the strong name identity.
The simple name of the identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值; 屬性可以是完整的名稱，或可以修改的最後一個位置中的萬用字元，例如 MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile 和 MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* 是有效的名稱。The value of the property can be an exact name or can be modified by a wildcard character in the final position; for example, both MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile and MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* are valid names. 如果您嘗試設定屬性設為空字串 ("")、就會擲回。If you attempt to set the property to an empty string (""), an is thrown.

span.span: The value is an empty string ("").

exception.span: 無法擷取屬性值，因為它包含模稜兩可的識別。

span.span: The property value cannot be retrieved because it contains an ambiguous identity.

Public Overrides Function ToXml () As SecurityElement

summary.span: 建立權限和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.

returns.span: 權限的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

span.span: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式程式碼通常不使用這個方法。This method is not typically used by application code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表的權限表示的所有作業的目前權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 權限的聯集並`null`是權限，不是`null`。The union of a permission and `null` is the permission that is not `null`. 權限的聯集和該權限的子集是包含其他的使用權限。The union of a permission and a subset of that permission is the permission that contains the other. 任何其他組合會導致擲回例外狀況。Any other combination results in an exception being thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用的結果方法，不是如何使用方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此範例中的最佳用途是建置及執行完整的範例，並檢視其輸出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#3)]

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前權限屬於不同的類型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
-or-

exception.span: 兩個權限不相等，且其中一個權限是另一個權限的子集。

span.span: The two permissions are not equal and one is a subset of the other.

The version of the identity.
